name: Moonster Shoot!
description:
This game is still in development mode. The idea is for the protagonist, Princess Belen, to kill the MOONsters, weird creatures that came from another planet and held hostage his father. To win you have to SHOOT all the MOONsters, kill them all, and avenge Princess Belen's father for him to regain his power to the throne.

A fun sci-fi adventure! Enjoy killing the moonsters!

Controls:

WASD - to move

Spacebar - to jump

Left Shift + WASD - to sprint

Left mouse click - to shoot the moonsters

Game Designers / Programmers:

Veronica && Sarah

Storyline:

Perea Fam Bam

Github repo link: https://github.com/mcronnie-dev/GameOff2020-Entry

Quick Fixes: [Edit]

- Broken Overlay in Game Menu

- Allowed Enter and Space Keys in Continuing Dialogues

- Enemy patrolling fixed
